title: Can the BTS members speak and understand English? How well? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most BTS members can understand English because understanding is easier than speaking. Several can speak English on various levels of fluency. RM, BTS' leader, speaks and understands the most English. He is the one who mainly speaks during English based interviews or speeches. Jungkook, BTS' youngest member, in my opinion speaks and understands better than most other members and he's actively learning and getting better at it because he says he wants to communicate more with international ARMY. Yoongi, he understands most English as well. We, as fans, have long suspected that he's fluent in English especially after finding out recently that he attended a private English academy during his training. He's can be the shy type sometimes which is why he may not speak English more, being shy about his accent. I think its cute lol based on that, he could be above Jungkook as far as fluency and ability to understand, he simply just doesnt use his skills lol. Next I'd say is probably J Hope. He understands quite well also and can sometimes speak on his own in English but isnt quite as fluent as those above him. Jin is probably next. He also understands a bit and can sometimes respond in English but it does come out as broken English or similar words and phrases. Taehyung I think understands as well a bit but responding in English isnt usual for him during English based interviews which, other than RM and Jungkook, they rest usually do respond in Korean in English interviews with RM or a translator helping them. But Tae does learn English phrases and words and practices hard to say them even if its just special occasions like speaking to an English crowd at a concert. Jimin, he seems to also understand a bit, but his fluency seems to lack the most. I feel he is the member least likely to answer in English unless he practices specifically like he did for the Grammy interviews. Each member other than RM had a phrase or two practices ahead of time that they could use if they heard a certain question. Jimin and Taehyung practiced what seems to be the hardest. Jimin, while he likes to answer during US interviews, its always in Korean it seems with RM translating for him.

He became fluent through the American show Friends, but I feel like there is more to it than that. Maybe an English class in school?Suga - Misconception with the silent member. He usually doesn't speak in interviews, but he can understand English pretty well. He just prefers to speak in Korean. He attended an English academy, so in terms of speaking and understanding its pretty well. He’s just quiet.Jungkook - He works hard and studies a lot. He English has improved immensely and can say lots of phrases and sentences including, “Some BTS members are from Hogwarts! "He wants to help carry the burden for RM. Hardworking and noble! *tears*Jin - Jin practices his English in a couple of interviews and while he has some trouble he isn't afraid to practice it. I think it has improved immensely from his days of saying Roma instead of Roman.J - Hope - J-Hope has to know some English to produce and write songs for BTS. I don't think he utilizes it often though. He did Dionysus and that had a few words in English. He is great at speaking it and knows how to pick up words quickly. So I say has great at it. No more accent and influent reading.V - V can speak English decently, but in terms of other members, he has a more basic vocabulary and has a harder time picking words up. This is evident in videos and in VLive. I'm pretty sure no one will forget the time V said, “I'm God.” Instead of “I'm good!” It was a good laugh though. XDJimin - Jimin tries! He tries really hard! He just has trouble picking it up and is the most conscience around things. He can have conversations and pronounce things well, but its not as well as the others, but he tries! HE TRIES!-Jess the insomniac teen

He has said that he taught himself English by watching FRIENDS in his school days. Kim Seokjin aka Jin can too understand and speak a bit. But, he's good enough to called himself Worldwide handsome in every other interview. Min Yoongi aka Suga too is good at English. He is said to be secretly fluent in English and you can find videos on YT as a proof that he actually is. He also raps in English in some of his self written songs, so ya I think he is good at English but tends to keep quiet during the interviews. That how he is. Jung Hoseok aka jhope ok I guess. "I'm your hope, you're my hope, I'm jhope" " I hate snakeu" "…and Sprite" "They made us what we are today, they gave us the wings to fly" Park Jimin or simple jimin too is ok I'll say. But he has always remembered these words "remember, we love you" Kim Taehyung or V too I guess is ok? Jeon Jeongguk or Jungkook has been working hard to learn English these days. In a recent interview too all the members and he himself too agreed that he's the one who spends the most learning English. He also showed some words he learnt in his recent Vlive and uses some English sentences too. All in all, their English has improved a lot from before. You can see that RM doesn't need to translate everything to them now. They try their best to express in English while they're in a foreign country. These were what I think from what I've observed from their recent interviews and vlives.

The members have expressed how much they've been trying to learn and study English, but there's still a lot they don't know which requires them to still have a translator. Jimin has said that he doesn't know English very well at all and tends not to speak it a lot, and that he also doesn't understand some of the time. Jungkook, the youngest member, has stated numerous times that he studies hard and is now starting to understand things more and more, and the group has even said that he is the one who practices and studies English the most. And then of course we have RM who is fluent and understands pretty much anything that is said. As for the other members it's more difficult to tell, because Suga will randomly start speaking in English and seems to understand questions before they are translated. And J-Hope speaks English quite well and seems to know and understand a lot. For Jin he has said before that he wished he'd studied more and knew English at the time of debut, but that now he is beginning to learn and understand more. Finally V. We can see V speaking English a lot, but sometimes he tends to use the wrong words or mispronounces somethings and during English interviews he doesn't seem to understand until something is translated. So all members can speak a bit of English and some can understand most things.

I went to the MetLife concert in New Jersey on May 18. So I saw them live without any editing without any monitors in the way etc. From what I understand, clearly Namjoon speaks very good English. Jin and Suga understand and speak English but are not confident enough to fully express what they want. Or maybe they were just tired and not in the mood to think lol. Jimin was def trying his best and spoke pretty well. As did Jungkook and JHope. Actually I was very impressed with Jungkooks vocabulary and Jhopes pronunciation. They’re getting very good. Tae told us a story about asparagus lol. I believe he mentioned that he’d prepared the speech (ie rehearsed it) prior so I’m not too sure how well he is at formulating sentences. I am however pretty confident that all of them understand English well. They will nod along in interviews and they do have a relationship with a few English-speaking artists (like Halsey) so they have to have some level of comprehension. I think it just matters how confident they are in speaking.

But I believe he understood most of the words Jhope, Taehyung and Jimin : They are not that fluent, but they are quite confident sometimes. So, I put them in same position. It’s hugely believed that Yoongi took an English course at one stage and it’s noticeable that he can understand the language, yet it’s also clear that he struggles with sentence orderings and pronunciation. I would argue that Hoseok, Taehyung and obviously Namjoon are the most fluent in the group, I didn’t say Jungkook as he openly admits to finding English difficult. The reason I say Hoseok is quite fluent is because he is good with pronunciations and structuring sentences. I said Taehyung because he can follow the language quite well but he also knows how to answer questions short and to the point.
